Title: Asian LNG buyers not scrambling to stock up, await clarity on sanctions against Russia
Description: Asian LNG buyers are awaiting more clarity on the sanctions that the US and its allies will impose on Russia for its military attacks on Ukraine today and what repercussions they might have on term LNG imports from Russia and LNG supplies globally before deciding on what steps they should take to ensure stable and adequate supplies.
Author: CK

Title: Japan’s LNG stockpile sufficient to last 2-3 weeks: METI
Description: Japan does not expect the Russia-Ukraine conflict to immediately disrupt domestic supplies of energy. Nevertheless, the country has sufficient stockpiles of LNG to last two to three weeks and oil stocks that will last 240 days, according to the country’s Agency for Natural Resources and Energy.
Author: CK
